name: “八高組”Ｐ４主人公
expansion: Persona Q Shadow of the Labyrinth
flavor_text:
要は、仲間になろうってことだろ？

ability: 【A】 When 「謎に挑む者たち」 is placed into your Climax Slot, if this card is in the Front Row, reveal the top card of your Deck. If that card is a Character with Cost 0 or lower, you may place that Character in any slot on Stage. （If it is not, return revealed card to its original position）
【A】 ［①］ When the damage dealt by this card is cancelled, you may pay the cost. If you did, draw 1 card.

name: “月高組”Ｐ３主人公
expansion: Persona Q Shadow of the Labyrinth
flavor_text: じゃあ、みんな行こう
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may place the top card of your Clock into Waiting Room.

【A】 When this card attacks, if 「謎に挑む者たち」 is in the Climax Slot, during that turn, this card gets +1000 Power, +1 Soul and gains the following ability. 『【A】 This ability can only be activated once each turn. When the damage dealt by this card is cancelled, you may deal 1 Damage to your opponent.』 （Damage can be cancelled）
